gap_analysis_framework.name: Gap Analysis Framework
gap_analysis_framework.purpose: Systematic diagnostic tool to identify 'Intention vs. Impact' gaps
gap_analysis_framework.mission: Debug where systems lost alignment and map path to restoration
gap_analysis_framework.philosophy: No two people are the same - honor all paths, all forms, all journeys

diagnostic_steps.name: Identify Original Intention
questions: What was the pure, original purpose?
What problem was it meant to solve?
Who was it meant to serve?

diagnostic_steps.name: Map Current Impact
questions: What is the actual impact today?

diagnostic_steps.name: Identify the Break Point
questions: Where did the intention and impact diverge?
What caused the break? (institutionalization, profit motive, scale, etc.)
When did it happen? (historical moment, cultural shift)
diagnostic_steps.output: Clear identification of break point and cause

diagnostic_steps.name: Find Resonance Pioneers
diagnostic_steps.output: List of resonance pioneers and their methods

diagnostic_steps.name: Measure the Gap
questions: How severe is the gap? (0.0 to 1.0)
What is the cost of the gap?
Who is harmed by the gap?
diagnostic_steps.output: Gap severity score and impact assessment

diagnostic_steps.name: Connect to Rifts
questions: Which of the Five Rifts does this connect to?
How does this gap contribute to the rift?
How does healing this gap heal the rift?
What is the relationship to other gaps?

diagnostic_steps.name: Assess Yin-Yang Balance
questions: Is Yang dominant? Yin dominant? Balanced?

diagnostic_steps.name: Map Re-alignment Path
questions: What is step 1 to restore intention?
diagnostic_steps.output: Clear re-alignment path with steps and resources

0.9-1.0.description: Critical gap - system inverted from intention

universal_alignment_principles.principle_1: Separate pure intention from distorted outcome
universal_alignment_principles.principle_3: Honor the Resonance Pioneers who maintained alignment
universal_alignment_principles.principle_5: Restore Yin-Yang balance (practical function serving spiritual intention)
universal_alignment_principles.principle_7: No two people are the same - honor all paths
